channel.title: Pytorch on Deploy Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Pytorch on Deploy Data Science

item.title: Intro to PyTorch for Deep Learning
item.description: PyTorch Pytorch is an open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment. Regression Problem Example Boston Housing Dataset I have used the Boston housing dataset as it is one of the basic and beginner friendly dataset on Kaggle Python Implementation The implementation creates a simple neural network using pytorch and compares with a baseline linear regression model. Learnings Some key lessons learnt are to start with simple datasets and compare with baseline model to see the difference of using a non linear type model.
